abstract: Ken Johnson reviews outdoor art exhibitions Drifting in Daylight: Art in Central Park, offering ephemeral projects by eight artists, and Please Touch the Art, display of interactive sculptures by Danish artist Jeppe Hein, at Brooklyn Bridge Park.
lead_paragraph: “Drifting in Daylight” presents mostly ephemeral projects in Central Park, while “Please Touch the Art” displays interactive sculptures by Jeppe Hein in Brooklyn Bridge Park.

headline.main: Review: ‘Please Touch the Art’ and ‘Drifting in Daylight,’ Outdoor Art at the Parks
headline.print_headline: Frolicking With Art in the Wild Green Yonder

snippet: “Drifting in Daylight” presents mostly ephemeral projects in Central Park, while “Please Touch the Art” displays interactive sculptures by Jeppe Hein in Brooklyn Bridge Park.
